title: Diplo and Hugel to Headline Sun-Kissed Breakaway Beach Event for Miami Music Week 2025
description: The poolside event will take place at Hyde Beach one day prior to the start of Miami's iconic Ultra Music Festival.

title: Justin Timberlake Cancels Columbus Show for a Second Time Amid Flu Battle
description: The star previously postponed the show back in October due to bronchitis and laryngitis.
author: Rania Aniftos

title: With ‘Luther’ & More, Kendrick Lamar Is Making History on Billboard’s Airplay Charts
description: He is the first artist in a lead role to claim the top four on Rhythmic Airplay – or any radio ranking.

title: $500m-valued Suno has admitted training AI on copyrighted music. That hasn’t stopped Amazon from adding its controversial tech to Alexa

title: Garden State 20th Anniversary Benefit Show to Stream on Veeps
